Plot: After Ben and George get married, George is fired from his teaching post, forcing them to stay with friends separately while they sell their place and look for cheaper housing -- a situation that weighs heavily on all involved.
Title: Love Is Strange
Actors: John Lithgow, Alfred Molina, Tatyana Zbirovskaya, Olya Zueva
tomatoConsensus: Held aloft by remarkable performances from John Lithgow and Alfred Molina, Love Is Strange serves as a graceful tribute to the beauty of commitment in the face of adversity.
